column4: help! i deleted my linux partitions and screwed up grub in the process, and then i couldn't boot vista, so i got my 9.04 live cd out (on it now) and tried to fix my windows MBR - and now i get an error that says winload.exe could not be used - it may be missing or corrupt. help!!! how can i fix winload.exe ???
Dr Willis - i need the space on my HD. for now i'm done with ubuntu, i'm going to get it back after i finish a c++ class i'm taking when i don't have to use command prompt everyday
kalmi_ : i didn't. i'm using the livecd
dr_willis_: ok. thank you, i'll check them out. i'll also google fixmbr.
how the heck do i get a win98 cd? and that will help me boot vista?
or a disk of          free dos
or a disk of          free dos

don't really need a win98,                 download "free DOS"
follow the instructions to make flopyes
